issue.title: [CF 568] Colors for custom textures...
issue.body:
More of a feature question ... have not been able to find it but wanted to ask.  Is it possible to change the color of custom textures?  I have a custom texture I want to be white or pink or orange when triggered in different buttons.  I don't need it to be dynamic, just a way to change/modify the color of a texture.  Power Aura had/has this capability and it is very useful.

I uploaded one of the textures I am using - aura4.tga

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Use a custom texture
2.
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
I would like to be able to select a color to modify the texture appearance.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
6.0.3 r567

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

> Posted by CurseForge user Stanoslav

This would be a possibility when I finally get around to rewriting the color system. For now, though, I'm going to mark this as declined, since I'm not sure when I will get around to doing so.

Rest assured, though, that this will be possible with the ideas that have been brewing in my head for the past few months.
